name: FNF Revenge: Whitty
description:
FNF Revenge: Whitty

Source: https://www.play-games.com/fnf-games.html

The first game from a new FNF game series called Revenge. Here you will have the opportunity to get revenge on an ex-boyfriend named Whitty.

You can use numerous tools to do that. Earn points, money, and buy new stuff. If you like this type of game, don't forget to comment to know if I will make more games like this.

If you are looking to play FNF Test games, here are my games: https://itch.io/c/1664099/fnf-test

Download Whitty Mod from GB: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44214 

Original Whitty Mod created by: Artist and Song Composer: Sock.clip Note Charter, Secondary Animator, and Play Tester: Nate Anim8 Coder: Kadedev 

Original FNF creators: Programing by ninjamuffin99 Art by PhantomArcade 3K and Evilsk8r Music by Kawai Sprite 

FNF Revenge: Whitty creators: Play-Games.com
